column6: Blade goes up against the monarch of a Balkan nation...  but it's not Dracula (been there, done that).  This time, Blade has set his sights on none other than Dr. Doom!  Plus, a look into Blade's mysterious past!
column8: | penciller:Howard Chaykin | colorist:Edgar Delgado | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | writer:Marc Guggenheim
